pkgmetadata.longdescription: jft===============This project is a collection of function test pairs for common tasks.Mostly for my own use but others are welcome to leverage it.## Required configuration`git config --global user.email "you@example.com"``git config --global user.name "Your Name`## Required packages* `sudo apt install twine`## Recommended packages* `sudo npm i -g nodemon`## Test Cycle`nodemon --exec python3 test.py`
